channel.title: Overview on Hugo Whisper Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Hugo Whisper Theme

item.title: Install Hugo
item.description: Hugoのインストール方法。 Hugoのバージョン確認 This theme uses Hugo Pipes to compile SCSS and minify assets. Please make sure you have the Hugo Extended version installed. If you are not using the extended version this theme will not not compile.
